you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1618 a and today's date is July
18th 2018 and the thought of the episode
is the plan hi data and bring the stock
market down let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we've been
talking about how each side is going to
try to control the narrative and we
already see what the central bank is
doing and they're really pushing their
agenda forward because they realized the
economy
well it's falling apart very very
quickly and they're very worried that
they will lose control and they like the
control because they want to form their
narrative as the economy falls apart and
yesterday we talked about how we were in
stage two of this housing bubble moving
into stage three and if we look at
housing right now housing should be
booming at this time prices should not
be coming down we should see a huge
amount of traffic we should see mortgage
applications moving up we should see
starts permits all of it moving up now
in May we saw that building permits they
plunged and June they expected that
everything was going to rebound but it
didn't hermits dropped two point two
percent month and month
housing starts collapsed twelve point
three percent month on month this is the
third month of declining permits in a
row and the biggest drop since November
of 2016 now total housing starts decline
year-on-year for the first time since
2017 of December and what we're looking
at right now is everything is starting
to break apart and fall apart
deteriorate and everything is declining
now again we mentioned it's not just
here in the United States it's happening
all around the world as the Fed
continually raises its interest rates
the LIBOR continually pushes up it
pushes many many individuals out of the
market and we're starting to see the
effects of this now of course the Fed is
doing this very very slowly
they don't want everyone to catch on and
what they're doing if you just look back
in time and you look back prior to 2008
2005-2006 then especially into 2007 you
can see they were raising the rate and
they quickly then started to drop them
because they real
what was happening in the housing market
and this is when we saw people in
California with their adjustable
adjustable rate mortgages they just left
their homes left everything inside and
they just couldn't afford to stay in
those house and now remember there's a
lot of speculation out there there's a
lot of people doing a lot of different
things and we're starting to see a
problem in the housing market now if we
look at the Fed we know what their plan
is we know what they're trying to do
here the Fed is saying that they're
going to be raising the interest rates
they're going to push it up and remember
everyone's talking about the Treasury
yield curve it's going to invert which
means it indicates a recession and we
need to think about what the Fed has
been doing the Fed has been hiding data
changing data making everyone think that
they're unimportant and we talked about
all the different things that they were
getting rid of or changing their balance
sheet the change in the yield curve and
when we start to look at this we can see
this is the reason why they are changing
how the yield curve is calculated but of
course those people in the industry
they're gonna continue to calculate the
yield curve like they have always done
but the Fed wants to put this
information out there and they want
everyone to start looking at the way
they're doing it because they understand
that this is an indicator of a recession
and this is exactly what's happening
here now when we look at this why is the
Fed worried about people catching on and
what the yield curve is doing well their
plan might be to crash the stock market
to save the bonds now the single most
important bond in the world is most
likely the 10-year US Treasury bond this
bond represents the risk-free rate of
return for a total economic cycle
roughly 10 years to nominate in the
global reserve currency which is the US
dollar put simply this is the bond to
watch if you want to keep an eye on how
financial systems are acting it is the
bedrock for all risk and its yield
represents rate of return against which
all risk assets are priced and value
now with all that in mind we need to
note that they yield on the 10-year US
Treasury has broken above it's a
long-term 20-year bull market trendline
this is a major problem and the Fed is
going to fix it by crashing stocks so
the fact is is that the Fed has to act
to stop the bond bubble from bursting
and it's going to do this by of course
crushing the stocks and driving capital
into the bond market to force yields
lower what does this mean the stock
market is now on borrowed time and
remember they have the ability to pump
the stock market up they already have
central banks out there purchasing
stocks they have banks where they're
receiving the free money they're going
in and they're also purchasing stocks
they have the ability to pump the stock
market up and they know this so what
they're doing right now is they're going
to push the market to the edge bring it
down and of course when this happens we
know that certain corporations are going
to say ok we need to cut back we need to
layoff and it gives them the excuse to
do what they like to call restructuring
which is getting rid of the low lying
fruit getting rid of a lot of people to
save a lot of money because we know a
lot of their books are fake phony and
false and at this time we can see this
is part of the plan of what the Fed is
doing now when that comes down the
economy is going to be reeling at this
time but they don't care about that it
makes no difference to them if it's
doing well or not doing well because
they make money either way and they have
full control of the system remember
they're not dealing in paper currency
they like hard assets and they don't
really care what happens when things
start to fall apart actually they like
it they like stealing the wealth from
the everyday person this is what the
central banks are all about now there
are certain countries out there that are
very nervous about central banks the
private western central banks they
understand what is going on and we see
that Russia they have been liquidating
the US Treasury holdings and if we look
at this we can see that Russia they have
been dumping treasury holdings according
to the latest just released
International Capital update tick in May
the selling of Treasuries by official
entities continued with another 24
billion sold in the month of May when
yields continued to rise and eventually
hit the 2018 highs of 3.1 1% and this
was Russia they were dumping Treasuries
they're protecting themselves they don't
want to be a part of this whole entire
system when it completely comes down
remember Russia does not have that much
debt right now and basically if they get
rid of these Treasuries they are then
protecting themselves now what's very
interesting is that powell he was
testifying in front of the senate
committee and senator heidi heitkamp
decided to ask powell a question and she
cited a speech from former Fed chair Ben
Bernanke in attempt to get panel to be
more specific with her question she said
would you agree with Ben Bernanke when
he said in 2007 a speech that he made on
trade that restricting trade by imposing
tariffs quotas or other barriers is
exactly the wrong thing to do for the
economy this is what she asked Powell
Powell's response was simple assuming
you're talking about them remaining in
place over a sustained period of time
absolutely
Powell also made his most direct warning
about the risk to the economy as a
result of escalating trade wars he went
on to say we hear from our extensive
network of business contacts a rising
course of concern as you pointed out
lots and lots of individual companies
have been harmed by this we don't see
this in the aggregate numbers yet
because it's a 20 trillion economy and
these things take time to show up but we
hear many many stories of companies that
are concerned and now beginning to make
investment decisions or not make them
because of this now remember Powell is
out there and he's saying that the
economy is doing fantastically
everything that they've done has
improved the economy and these tariffs
and these tax cuts well this is
uncharted waters
and it might bring the whole system down
once again what they're doing is they're
trying to create this narrative of why
this is all going to fall apart and we
need to remember the central bankers
this is their system this is what
they're protecting and anything that
goes against what their system is it's
going to be no it's going to be a
disaster it's gonna be no good just like
when the brexit votes was was being held
what did they tell us if the people
decide to vote themselves away from the
EU the entire economy would completely
fall apart in the UK and then we had the
brexit vote and what happened well it
didn't it didn't fall apart they were
completely wrong even now they're saying
if they go ahead and they detach
themselves from the EU with some type of
hard brexit not this ridiculous brexit
that may came up with their economy
would implode basically the central
bankers they do the same thing as the
deep state they make these threats they
scare people they put fear into
individuals because what they really
want is they want to make sure that
everyone understands that if you try to
leave the central banking system the
private western central banking system
you will not be able to survive why do
you think the central bank the biz is
out there and they're trying to explain
why you can't have a different currency
than the one that they are issuing it's
completely impossible it won't work
don't even try don't even try to use
cryptocurrency don't even try to create
your own currency it's not going to work
it's not centralized it has to be a
centralized currency the central banks
have to handle everything they have to
handle everything with trade they have
to ever handle everything with interest
rates they have to handle everything
with the creation of currency why
because they need total control of the
system because their system is weak
their system does not work for the
people their system would rip apart if
they didn't control every aspect and
controlling every aspect doesn't make
the system better actually what it does
it hurts the everyday person and makes
them wealthier and wealthier this is why
we're seeing wealth inequality right now
because what their system has done it
has destroyed everything that we have
today so they're laying the groundwork
right now they're pushing their agenda
and we're gonna see a lot more of this
and they're going to continue with this
theme and they're not going to let up on
the other side what is Trump and the
Patriots doing now Trump is out there
saying that this is the best economy
ever now this is a pretty darn good
strategy that he is using think about
what he's doing right now pushing the
agenda to say that this economy is great
it's fantastic unemployment is low
everything is great stock market is
fantastic when it all falls apart he can
make the case where the Fed was saying
the economy was great and he can make
the case saying well we got this economy
from Obama the economy was doing
fantastically all the numbers that you
were giving us like you were giving
Obama showed that the economy was doing
fantastically what happened here now of
course they're going to try to blame the
tariffs and they're gonna try to make
the case that it was the tariffs they're
gonna come out with some type of story
just like they did in the 70s where they
said we had to come off the gold center
because the speculators but if you
notice they never really showed any
proof they really never showed what was
really going on they just had the
mainstream media come out and tell us
that it was speculators that this is why
we have to do this so what does Trump
and the Patriots need to do at this
point and we know that Rand Paul is
behind this all they need to do is
present evidence truth to show that the
tariffs had no effect on the economy
whatsoever and show what the central
banks have done it's very very simple
and once they do this he could then take
it to the next level and say well
they've done this this and that maybe we
should look a little bit closer to see
what else they've been doing and
can get the ball rolling here and of
course in his position with other
Patriots they know exactly what's been
going on they know exactly how the Fed
works they know exactly what is
happening here so they do have the
ability to create their narrative to
bring it out into the open and to show
the American people what has really been
going on because again we have no idea
what the Fed is doing we have no idea
what their books look like we have no
idea about anything and they're supposed
to be working for the people and
actually controlling the people's
economy but they're a private entity
they're not part of the government it is
now time to look inside of the Fed to
see what they've been up to all along
and I think this is going to be the
ultimate bombshell and this is going to
be the ultimate takedown of the central
bank the deep state but one thing is for
sure the system's gonna have to restart
and we're gonna go through a transition
it's gonna be a little tough this is why
you need to prepare this is why you need
food and water because when credit
freezes up when they're trying to get
rid of the central bank when you can't
get supplies from stores when we see
inflation when we're moving to a new
currency it's gonna take a little while
for things to calm down think about the
1970s when we're coming off the gold
standard how many people didn't have
jobs how we couldn't get fuel in the UK
there were blackouts we were going
through a major transition at that time
this time it's going to be a lot worse
last time we didn't have this much debt
last time we didn't have all these
problems last time we're moving from the
gold standard on to the Fiat system
guess what the dollar
well that was still the reserve currency
this time I don't know if the dollars
going to be the reserve currency most
likely not and we're moving to something
different so we're gonna go through a
lot of bumps a lot of hiccups and for
many people it's gonna be quite tough
and this is why you need to be prepared
and ready
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
be prepared thanks a lot
